definition[0]: done or working without using money in the form of coins and notes
definition[1]: a cashless system works without any money in the form of notes or coins being given from one person or company to another, for example by the use of BANK TRANSFERs or CREDIT CARDs
example[2]: Employees will no longer be able to opt out of cashless pay systems.
example[3]: American Express has a strong core business because the cashless society is an unstoppable trend.
